virtual-sensor.name: Matterhorn_Dozer_Th3Ident__conv
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerWxt520IdentMsg) from Matterhorn deployment converted

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, GENERATION_TIME, TIMESTAMP, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION0 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION0 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION0), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION1 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION1 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION1), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION2 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION2 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_FIRMWAREVERSION2), '') as FIRMWAREVERSION, CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL0 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL0 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL0), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL1 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL1 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL1), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL2 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL2 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL2), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL3 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL3 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL3), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL4 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL4 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL4), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL5 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL5 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL5), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL6 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL6 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL6), '') || CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_SERIAL7 >=32 AND PAYLOAD_SERIAL7 <= 126, char(PAYLOAD_SERIAL7), '') as SERIAL from wrapper
